00025 #ifndef PHOENIXPBE
00026 #define PHOENIXPBE

00028 #include "PhSceneManager.h"
00029 #include "PhParticleSystem.h"
00030 
00032 // Box Emitter (Easy to turn this into a point emitter)
00034 
00035 namespace phoenix
00036 {
00037 
00038 class PhBoxEmitter : public PhParticleEmitter
00039 {
00040 
00041 protected:
00042 
00043     //rectangle to create the particles in
00044     PhRect rect;
00045 
00046     //random function
00047     template <class a_type> a_type random(a_type low,a_type high)
00048     {
00049         return (a_type(rand()) % (high - low + a_type(1)) + low);
00050     }
00051 
00052 public:
00053 
00054     //construct and destruct
00055     PhBoxEmitter(PhSceneManager* s, PhTexture* i, PhRect rt, PhParticleType pt, int p, float d, bool c);
00056     ~PhBoxEmitter();
00057 
00058     //functions for getting rectangle stuff
00059     int getX();
00060     void setX(int);
00061     int getY();
00062     void setY(int);
00063     int getWidth();
00064     void setWidth(int);
00065     int getHeight();
00066     void setHeight(int);
00067 
00068     //PreRender function (Should only be called by scene manager)
00069     void onPreRender();
00070 
00071     //Render function (should only be called by scene manager)
00072     void onRender();
00073 
00074     //Postrender (should only be called by scene manager)
00075     void onPostRender();
00076 
00077 };
00078 
00079 }
00080 
00081 #endif
